vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_0.sol#58) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_0.sol#19-27):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_0.sol#25)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_0.sol#26)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_0.sol#1): it allows old versions
